title: Jenna Coleman
summary: Jenna-Louise Coleman (born 27 April 1986), since 2013 credited as Jenna Coleman, is an English actress. She is known for playing Jasmine Thomas in the soap opera Emmerdale, Clara Oswald in the science-fiction series Doctor Who, Queen Victoria in the period drama Victoria, Joanna Lindsay in the crime miniseries The Cry, and Marie-Andr√©e Leclerc in the crime miniseries The Serpent.
